"To get this to work on the WCML North you need the HST Buffers pack installed. " - posted by nob14

I give it a shot, I waited for download (the link will go to a RapidShare, wait once again for download, bla bla). It's a .rar ~ 74.2 MB. Just decompress and Copy Paste in installed game folder. 
With WCML and Class 390 installed, it should work. I just did (for the first time) some class 390 routes so it works.

Have fun.
